faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: Do you offer weekly or fortnightly visits?
items.answer: Yes—weekly and fortnightly are both available depending on your lawn and the time of year.

items.question: Do you edge and strim?
items.answer: Yes. Keeping edges tidy is part of what makes the lawn look properly finished.

items.question: Can you take away grass clippings?
items.answer: Yes—clippings can be collected and removed. Let us know your preference when requesting a quote.

items.question: What happens if it rains?
items.answer: If weather affects the cut, we’ll communicate and reschedule to the next suitable time.

items.question: Can you do a one-off tidy?
items.answer: Yes—one-off cuts and tidy-ups are available, especially for a reset before regular maintenance.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.
